about.title: Who We Are
about.originContent: Born from a 15-year friendship and a shared passion for technology, Invoker Tech exists to make the digital world smarter, faster, and more accessible. We turn ideas into solutions that reinvent processes, cut waste, and deliver real results.
about.missionContent: We build innovative, custom tech solutions that modernize workflows, reduce rework, and maximize resources. By blending technical excellence with creativity, we make cutting-edge technology accessibleâ€”helping businesses grow with greater efficiency, intelligence, and impact.
about.lucasDescription: Full-Stack Developer specialized in modern web solutions and scalable architectures.
about.pedroDescription: Backend and Mobile Specialist, focused on automation and intelligent solutions for businesses.

services.title: Our Services
services.backendDescription: We develop robust and scalable APIs using the best development practices.
services.mobileDescription: We create native Android applications with seamless microservices integration.
services.aiDescription: We implement AI solutions to automate processes and extract insights from data.
services.webDescription: We develop custom portals, dashboards and data management systems.
services.advantage3: Use of modern and scalable technologies
services.advantage4: Combined experience in multiple areas (web, mobile, automation)
